website_summaries.verdict: A great primer for those looking to add some serious glow to their skin.
pros: Has ingredients to improve the look of wrinkles and fine lines
Can be used under foundation or alone to provide skin with an extra glow
cons: Several buyers say it's too glittery and doesn't help makeup last

customer_reviews.title: no results
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. I saw no result. Someone mentioned that it was meant to even out the skin tone, but it is called "Wonder Glow" and it did not give me any glow; also, it is pretty expensive to not see results. It smells great and I don't hate it, I just can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Adds a little sheen
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product after watching an online video from a makeup artist. Use it over my moisturizer or primer. Then loose powder, and then foundation. It is not sparkly, but as the name says, a little glow. Also put it on the top of my hands when I want them to look especially nice. A little goes a long way. You should try it! I am 66 yrs old and apply these products with a light hand. My skin looks great. The loose powder I use is also by Charlotte Tilbury. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Deanie

customer_reviews.title: The product is okay but would not buy again. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay but would not buy again. Goes on smooth & doesn't break me out, but I can't really tell the difference between this product and an inexpensive drug store brand.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels great and looks healthy.
customer_reviews.text: Really love. Smooth and a little goes a long way. I find that I am using it over my serum and sunscreen and no other makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Dear Charlotte, I love you!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this brand for it's safeness. I have super sensitive skin and multiple chemical sensitivities. This brand was recommended to me by my sister whose make-up is always flawless. I love this Wonderglow, I don't love the price but I will continue using it until my husband cuts me off ;)
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product for older skin. I am 78. it does not cover, just adds a glow and refreshes!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Boise

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it after my foundation to add a moisture and glow.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Light dewy finish
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd bottle! I like the dewy finish I get when using this product. It’s very light with a sheer finish no heavy buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Jsegedi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had first come across this product in a promotional sachet and loved its light and non greasy texture. It truly lights up the skin and brightens it while keeping the natural texture of the skin as is. Love this product. Its a bit pricey but I shall buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anita N.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the box!
customer_reviews.text: This gives a wonderful golden glow backdrop to your face. Can be worn alone for light coverage or under foundation, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joie De Vie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous glow!
customer_reviews.text: This goes on silky smooth and thin. Smells like a rose and adds the most beautiful glow to your skin. Worth the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: TNL

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous gorgeous gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I am a makeup junkie and have all types of highlighters but wonderglow tops them all !! Fresh , clean feel with a beautiful glow .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Michael Hantover

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: Expensive product. I saw absolutely no difference in texture, smoothness, appearance or glow.
customer_reviews.author: Assosssr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, I didn't know a huge difference for such a pricey product. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie V. Leiter

customer_reviews.title: Could have have a tiny bit more coverage.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little too sheer to actually make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Remy O.

customer_reviews.title: Charlotte Tilbury WonderGlow
customer_reviews.text: I love the WonderGlow under my foundation. It gives my face a beautiful glow
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Add some sparkle but no coverage
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight super sheer. Adds a pretty glow but has zero coverage.
customer_reviews.author: lANEY

customer_reviews.title: Misleading name-no glow
customer_reviews.text: I’m quite fair. It’s a nice moisturizer but I see absolutely no glow. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mckelvey

customer_reviews.title: But I like the product
customer_reviews.text: More expensive here than Bloomingdales. But I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: donnaleem
